title: I'm worried about my account
body:
I've tried not to be toxic but i just cant handle it sometimes. Ive spent about 700 euro on the account and ive just gotten a 14 day ban and im very terrified if im getting permabanned if i get one slip-tru again                                                                {{summoner:4}}
Please comment on what i can do

replies.body: Remove your enter keys while playing, and just play.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XJyLxapY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-26T21:41:15.836+0000)
>
> Remove your enter keys while playing, and just play.

or league can finally add an option to unbind the enter key??? a thing we've been requesting for years wtf lmfao

> [{quoted}](name=Revolucious,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XJyLxapY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-27T04:17:45.434+0000)
>
> or league can finally add an option to unbind the enter key??? a thing we've been requesting for years wtf lmfao

What is stopping you from rebinding them?
Insulting stickynote on your monitor, right over the chatbox.
make a smurf dont play on this one

Start the game with /mute all.

Though the real reform is understanding why you are getting angry. 

Are they making bad plays and you jump on them? Or are you responding to those that are saying you make a bad play?

Regardless of which on it is, you have to understand that this is a game. You are playing this seriously, but that one game of win or loss isn't going to suddenly make you hit your ranked goals.

Think of this like street football or basketball. You can be competitive in the game, but the point is to get some fun out of the game and it is really pointless to get angry at some stranger that you probably won't see again.

Also understand how the rules of the behavioral system. Play within the rules and you'll be fine.

There will be games where your allies don't do as well as you would wish. 

There will be games when a player will AFK. 

There will be games where an ally will try to make you lose. 

There will be games where your teammates are losing their cool and blaming everything on you. 

I think Rudyard Kipling needs to speak here.


**If you can keep your head when all about you   
    Are losing theirs and blaming it on you,   
If you can trust yourself when all men doubt you,
    But make allowance for their doubting too;   
If you can wait and not be tired by waiting,
    Or being lied about, don‚Äôt deal in lies,
Or being hated, don‚Äôt give way to hating,
    And yet don‚Äôt look too good, nor talk too wise:**

**If you can dream‚Äîand not make dreams your master;   
    If you can think‚Äîand not make thoughts your aim;   
If you can meet with Triumph and Disaster
    And treat those two impostors just the same;   
If you can bear to hear the truth you‚Äôve spoken
    Twisted by knaves to make a trap for fools,
Or watch the things you gave your life to, broken,
    And stoop and build ‚Äôem up with worn-out tools:**


**If you can make one heap of all your winnings
    And risk it on one turn of pitch-and-toss,
And lose, and start again at your beginnings
    And never breathe a word about your loss;
If you can force your heart and nerve and sinew
    To serve your turn long after they are gone,   
And so hold on when there is nothing in you
    Except the Will which says to them: ‚ÄòHold on!‚Äô**

**If you can talk with crowds and keep your virtue,   
    Or walk with Kings‚Äînor lose the common touch,
If neither foes nor loving friends can hurt you,
    If all men count with you, but none too much;
If you can fill the unforgiving minute
    With sixty seconds‚Äô worth of distance run,   
Yours is the Earth and everything that‚Äôs in it,   
    And‚Äîwhich is more‚Äîyou‚Äôll be a Man, my son!"**

It is a poem that speaks of being calm, cool, collected, and believing in yourself  all while you are facing the harsh treatment and harassment from those around you. It even speaks on being in a losing position but keeping your nerve about you. 

Believe in yourself, remain calm, and be the positive influence on your team,  even in the most hopeless scenarios, ok? üêù
